women-35-55.label: Women (Ages 35-55)
women-35-55.description: Women (Ages 35-55) - Fashion-conscious women who value sophistication and elegance in their style.

men-35-55.label: Men (Ages 35-55)
men-35-55.description: Men (Ages 25-55) - Classic and modern style enthusiasts who appreciate quality materials and craftsmanship.

women-25-35.label: Women (Ages 25-35)
women-25-35.description: Women (Ages 25-35) - Trend-driven women balancing social lives and career aspirations, often influenced by contemporary fashion.

men-25-35.label: Men (Ages 25-35)
men-25-35.description: Men (Ages 25-35) - Style-savvy men who are influenced by current trends and seek to express their individuality through fashion.

unisex-all.label: Unisex Customers (All Ages)
unisex-all.description: Unisex Customers (All Ages) - Individuals with a premium interest in high perfumery, seeking unique and quality fragrances that transcend gender norms.

feminine-all.label: Feminine Customers (All Ages)
feminine-all.description: Feminine Customers (All Ages) - Women drawn to modern niche collections, desiring individuality and uniqueness in their fashion choices.

young-adults-20-25.label: Young Adults (Ages 20-25)
young-adults-20-25.description: Young Adults (Ages 20-25) - Individuals exploring personal style, often influenced by social media trends and peer recommendations.

adults-25-40.label: Adults (Ages 25-40)
adults-25-40.description: Adults (Ages 25-40) - Fashion-aware adults balancing personal and professional life, interested in versatile fashion for various occasions.
